Cost function:
dx = T.min([abs(y[0]-self.y_pred[0]),(2*pi - abs(y[0]-self.y_pred[0]))])
dy = T.min([abs(y[1]-self.y_pred[1]),(2*pi - abs(y[1]-self.y_pred[1]))])
dz = T.min([abs(y[2]-self.y_pred[2]),(2*pi - abs(y[2]-self.y_pred[2]))])
Error_rotation = np.sqrt(np.add( np.add(T.pow(dx, 2),T.pow(dy, 2)),T.pow(dz, 2))) *alpha

Error_translation = np.linalg.norm(t0,2) *beta

Error += (Error_rotation + Error_translation)	For each object in batch size


Truth & Prediction = [r,p,y,x,y,z] 
E_test & E_validation = mean(Error)

batch_size = 6
nkerns = (5,5,5,5,5,5)

alpha = 0.031
beta = 0.005


E_validation = 0.31
E_test = 0.36

Error_rotation = [  0.06490812,  0.10471486,  0.0633009 ,  0.08865412,  0.01821916, 0.07705617,
